headline: Knucklehead Of The Week: Cackling Kamala, Queen Of Clumsy Communication
author: P.F. Whalen
sentences: With President Biden’s disastrous State of the Union speech on Tuesday night, a very strong argument could be made to declare our esteemed Commander-in-Chief as the week’s top knucklehead – again.
So, we’re going to cut Sleepy Joe a break this week and opt instead for that stellar sidekick of his: the one and only, Vice-President Kamala Harris.
Winner: Vice-President Harris thinks we’re all third graders and tells us, accurately, that we got what we voted for.
But that would be akin to beating a dead horse… with our apologies to dead horses.
Kamala Harris hasn’t had many good weeks during her 13+ months
